whitewhite-primewhite-prime-venetianwhite-venetianprimeprime-venetianvenetian

Origin, Basic White - Venetian Blind (247blinds)

The origin in basic white is made from heavy gauge aluminium guaranteed not to sag. Its wipe-clean practicality combined with the pure white, satin look finish make this blind an attractive option that is pleasing in both looks and functionality. If it's a fresh, clean style that you're looking for, blend the basic white with an all-white colour palette that's perfect for the bathroom or kitchen.

whitewhite-originwhite-origin-venetianwhite-venetianoriginorigin-venetianvenetian

Origin, Magnolia - Venetian Blind (247blinds)

The queen of neutrality, the magnolia version of their origin aluminium range is a simple choice that will match almost any colour it's paired with. Its satin finish and colour-coordinated cords provide it with a streamlined look that only the best of neutrals can achieve. If you love colour-blocking and continuation, go as far as setting the magnolia amongst matching magnolia walls, resulting in a clean, aerodynamic feel in a living room, hallway, or kitchen.

creamcream-origincream-origin-venetiancream-venetianoriginorigin-venetianvenetian

Origin, Black - Venetian Blind (247blinds)

Don't be put off by the colour black's reputation; the origin in black is much more versatile, and can be far less moody, than you might think. Paired with the right dcor, the gloss aluminium slats and coordinated fittings can look simple and sophisticated. Set the black against white walls in a modern living room and complement with bright limes or fruity oranges for a step away from monochromatic living and towards boldness and colour.

blackblack-originblack-origin-venetianblack-venetianoriginorigin-venetianvenetian

Origin, Brushed Silver - Venetian Blind (247blinds)

The ultra-metallic brushed silver from the origin range is the height of utilitarian style. With a polished, near-matte finish, the blind's aluminium slats are sturdy and hardwearing, and easily controlled using the colour-matched cords that hang from the sides. The beauty of the brushed silver is that it can be used as part of a room's central colour scheme, or incorporated as a simple accent, in the same way as a fixture or fitting might.

Their best-selling 35mm premier faux wood range are made from high-quality flame-retardant pvc slats, and this bright, embossed white faux wood easily brightens the room. A perfect addition to rooms that need optimum light and privacy control, their faux wooden blinds are great for kitchens and bathrooms, with easy-care wipe-clean slats and a clean tailored finish, these blinds are a firm favourite with their customers.

Lifetimesmoothdark greybrings an emphatic colour statement in yourroom, what's not to like about grey? Their outstanding quality lifetime blinds are made to the same high standards as all their other venetian blinds - we are confident you will not buy better quality blinds, backed by their 3 year guarantee. All blinds are sent with installation instructions, universal bracket (top fix, side fix or face fox) and a pelmet fascia to sit on the front of the blind headrail.

This is a sturdy, metal blind made up of slats that are easily adjustable to filter the light in or out. The wow factor in carmela star is a soft, barely-there gold with gently shimmering glitter, on firm aluminium slats, creating a pretty, metallic effect. Pair with browns and golds for a luxurious feel in the living or dining room, or use as a standout statement feature in your bedroom, set against white walls.

Mississippi Taped Medium Oak Real Wood (Swift directblinds)

Their beautiful wooden mississippi range, consists of several striking shades. Compliment you home with natural wood oak shades, go for cool white and cream neutrals or go for something extra special with grey shades. With complimentary components, the range will breath a new look into your home. Product id: sdb-wsb0677 fabric colour: medium oak material: bass wood headrail: high quality headrail with top or face fix brackets and matching pelmet slat width: 35mm,50mm control type: co-ordinated raise & tilt dual cords with matching toggles energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention tape colour: husk/coffee light filtering: yes mississippi taped medium oak real wood in brown/dark woods.

Lime is one of the most calm and natural finishes in the kaleidoscope range. With a premium gloss finish attracting your eye to this soothing shade of green you have the perfect recipe for combining functionality and style in one truly modern piece. We love the colour contrast when lime is placed with a range of light woods. It could be anything from a pine dining table or kitchen worktops, to a coffee table or a thick wooden window sill.

Plum is a rich and deep shade that helps add a relaxing and restful air to your home the instant you enter. With a high gloss finish that shimmers in the light you will be adding a touch of luxury that is perfectly accented by the ladder ribbons that bring this one of a kind design to life. We love using plum in the bedroom where the depth of the purple will allow you to switch off the moment your head hits the pillow.

venetian

White (7001) (SoEasy Blinds)

Low maintenance, moisture resistant venetian blinds are perfect for bathrooms and kitchens. Their unique cordless design eliminates unsightly hanging cords and allows you to easily tilt the slats in any direction for optimum light adjustment. Perfect for high humidity rooms. Easy to clean. Optimum light adjustment. Preserves your view whole providing privacy. No hanging cords. Installs in minutes.

Passionate Red (7060) (SoEasy Blinds)

Low maintenance, moisture resistant venetian blinds are perfect for bathrooms and kitchens. Their unique cordless design eliminates unsightly hanging cords and allows you to easily tilt the slats in any direction for optimum light adjustment. Perfect for high humidity rooms. Easy to clean. Optimum light adjustment. Preserves your view whole providing privacy. No hanging cords. Installs in minutes.

Santa Fe Cloud (Gloss) (SoEasy Blinds)

Min width: 305mm max width: 2896mm min drop: 305mm max drop: 3500mm slat composition: basswood slat widths available: 50mm guarantee: 12 months controls: a choice of standard controls (left hand tilt / right hand raise &amp;amp; lower), left hand controls (left hand tilt / left hand raise &amp;amp; lower) or right hand controls (right hand tilt / right hand raise &amp;amp; lower). Styling: co-ordinating cords as standard, tapes optional.
